original: Jernheden, Gunnar Richard, direktör, Varberg, f. 7/2/06 i Varberg. G. 32 m. Valborg Johansson. Barn: Sven f. 33. — Realex. i Varberg 22. Res. t. Estl., Lettl, Polen o. Tyskl. 31. Anst. v. Varbergsposten sed. 24, deläg. i o. dir. f. Tidn. A-B Varbergs-pO;Sten sed. 42. Led. av styr. f. Tidn. A-B Varbergsposten sed. 43 o. Bo-stadsfören. Prosten. Medl. av Frimurarorden.
translated: Jernheden, Gunnar Richard, director, Varberg, b. 7/2/06 in Varberg. Married in 1932 to Valborg Johansson. Children: Sven b. 1933. Completed secondary education in Varberg at age 22. Resided in Estonia, Latvia, Poland, and Germany in 1931. Employed by Varbergsposten newspaper since 1924, became co-owner and director of Tidn. A-B Varbergs-pO;Sten in 1942. Became a member of the board of Tidn. A-B Varbergsposten in 1943 and the local housing association Prosten. A member of the Freemasons' Order.
